title: GitHub Starlines
description: 动态生成 GitHub 星星历史徽章。
description:en-US: Create beautiful stargazers histograms of your repositories or gists.

alert.messages: 首次访问需要等待一会，等待图片生成。你也可以查看构建 [workflow runs](https://github.com/qoomon/starlines/actions/workflows/create-starline.yaml)
alert.messages:en-US: It can take some time until the image is ready, depending on the amount of stargazers to fetch and process. If you are eager to watch the image generation workflows progress jump to [workflow runs](https://github.com/qoomon/starlines/actions/workflows/create-starline.yaml).

linkRules.description:en-US: Count the number of stargazers of a repository

linkRules.description: 统计 Gist 的星标数量
linkRules.description:en-US: Count the number of stargazers of a gist
Count the number of stargazers of a user
